data.text:
One Two Buckle My Shoe

Hercule Poirot's dentist is shot dead minutes after Poirot leaves his surgery. Inspector Japp believes the death was a suicide, but Poirot believes it was a murder.

Willy's Story

As Willy's life spirals out of control, he finds something that could be the answer or could be his downfall.

Second Time Around

A former deputy commissioner is murdered, and the investigation turns up a connection to the unsolved murder of a girl that took place 18 years previously.

One Day a Lemming Will Fly - Part 1

Fitz continues his uneasy relationship with the Manchester constabulary when the crime fighters are called in to find a missing boy. Extra pressure is piled on when an angry mob gathers at the police station demanding action.
